job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-10-05T17:14:20.000Z", "description": "DESCRIPTION:
\u2022\tThese contingent workers will work closely with full-time research scientists and software engineers who are leading
\u2022\tcomputer vision research projects to ensure that the process runs smoothly, and that data annotation quality remains high to
\u2022\ttrain state-of-the-art machine learning models. Duties include:
\u2022\tData wrangling: writing data pipelines to upload annotations automatically; running existing ML models on large volumes of
\u2022\tdata; ad-hoc data analysis / visualization

Annotation task and vendor management:
\u2022\tcreating data annotation guidelines; curating ideal \u201cgold standard\u201d examples for annotators.
\u2022\tmanaging back-and-forth communications with annotators; reviewing annotation quality to identify themes and
\u2022\trelaying appropriate feedback to annotation vendors.

Skills required:
\u2022\tSQL, Python, Linux command line (Bash)
\u2022\tVery high attention to detail for managing large, complex annotation efforts
\u2022\tGood written communication skills to coordinate with annotators and team members
\u2022\t2+ years\u2019 work experience, including experience working with customer teams

Top must-have HARD skills:
\u2022\tSQL and Python is a need
\u2022\tLinux command line

Top 3 good-to-have skills:
\u2022\tGreat communication
\u2022\tUnderstanding of AI models would be great

Interview Loop/Process
\u2022\t2 coding interviews and 1 general interview
\u2022\tPDF homework-offline analysis, will submit the answers along with their resume
